Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPartForm
    This class allows the user to add parts from the GUI
    AddProductForm
    This class allows the user to add products from the GUI
    inHouse
    This class allows parts to be specified as inHouse with a corresponding machineID
    Inventory
    This class controls the Inventory of parts & products and the methods & variables they utilize
    Main
    This is the main class that runs the application
    mainScreenController
    Controller for main screen, allows the user to navigate the GUI and perform certain actions such as delete, and search
    ModifyPartForm
    this screen allows the user to modify a previously selected part
    ModifyProductForm
    This screen allows the user to modify a previously selected Product
    OutSourced
    This class all the addition of outSourced part objects with a unique companyName attribute
    Part
    This is the part class that includes the part constructor, variables, and methods
    Product
    This class holds the constructor, variables, and methods for products
